fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose to father at night. At the start of the next next day, a new player will be added named whatever you want with a random Rock role. You can only father twice.
- Choose to god at night. At the start of the next next next day, you will gain Overkill attack, Invincible defense, and the ability to attack people for one day/night cycle. You can only god twice.
